name: Banjo Pig
description:
Instructions - Use the number keys to change frets.

Use NUMPAD keys to pluck:

-7,8,9 - for A4 string.

-4,5,6 - for A3 string.

-1,2,3 - for D string.

Made in 24 hours to keep the dueling banjo pigs movement alive here in 2015. The banjo pigs duel started back in 2010 between artists Guy Francis, and Stacy Curtis. Read about it here.

Stacy Curtis recently underwent a stroke which caused him to lose his sight. Many artists have been making banjo pigs as a tribute and support for the renowned artist.

You can't truly consider your self an artist until you've banjo-pigged. May the duel forever live on!
